text: So today we find ourselves in Tallinn, Estonia.

We took the ferry over from Helsinki and it
was a two hour ride and now we're in a completely
new country.
Just like that.
Background music playing.
Bagpipes playing and drumming.
More music playing.
Background music playing.

If ever there was just a city just to randomly
wander around it is certainly Tallinn.
Background music playing.
And now we're in Sweden!
No, just kidding.
We're still in Tallinn.
Background music playing.
So I am loving Tallinn, Estonia.

I think this is actually my fifth time in
Europe but this maybe my favorite city ever.

It's just very medieval, very charming, really
cute and the food.
The feast that we had just now was amazing.
That just put the city up to the very top.
Background music playing.
Random chanting.
So it is now nine o'clock.

It is still daylight out but it is the end
of our day.

It's time to go catch our ferry back to Helsinki,
so we are saying goodbye to Tallinn and I
am very sad to be leaving.
I thought it was such a great city to visit.
